接口的使用
net.opentsdb.query.expression.Expression

  • 使用Expression的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.opentsdb.query.expression  

    • net.opentsdb.query.expression中Expression的使用

      实现Expression的net.opentsdb.query.expression中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Absolute
      Modifies each data point in the series with the absolute value, tossing away the signed component.
      class  Alias
      Returns an alias if provided or the original metric name if not.
      class  DiffSeries
      Performs a UNION set join on up to 26 metric query results and returns the difference.
      class  DivideSeries
      Performs a UNION set join on up to 26 metric query results and returns the quotient.
      class  HighestCurrent
      Implements top-n functionality by iterating over each of the time series, sorting and returning the top "n" time series with the highest current (or latest) value.
      class  HighestMax
      Implements top-n functionality by iterating over each of the time series, finding the max value for each time series within the query time range, and up to "n" time series with the highest values, sorted in descending order.
      class  MovingAverage
      Implements a moving average function windowed on either the number of data points or a unit of time.
      class  MultiplySeries
      Performs a UNION set join on up to 26 metric query results and returns the product.
      class  Scale
      Multiplies each data point in the series by the given factor.
      class  SumSeries
      Performs a UNION set join on x metric query results and returns the results.
      class  TimeShift 
      返回Expression的net.opentsdb.query.expression中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Expression ExpressionFactory.getByName(String function)
      Returns the expression function given the name
      参数类型为Expression的net.opentsdb.query.expression中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ExpressionTree(Expression expression, TSQuery data_query)
      Creates a tree with a root and no children
